To:
ALL RADIO NETWORK STATIONS
From:
NETWORK MANAGER
Date:
MAY 6, 1958
Subject:
CANCELLATION OF SERIES
The series CURTAIN GOING UP III (57-56) has not been distributed according
to schedule for the past two months or more because the master tapes have
not been received from the originating station.
Because it would, at this late date, be impossible to pick up the series
again this series is hereby CANCELLED from the second and third quarter
offerings.
We hope to have another CURTAIN GOING UP series beginning next winter.
This depends, of course, on what arrangements we can make regarding the
prompt delivery of master tapes.
We are sorry that this action had to be taken.
REU/dfc
